Basics./follow:
Run this command to receive tweets from a user! You can set the bot to ping @everyone, just you, or noone.
You may run this command in any channel!
Basics./unfollow: Run this command to receiving tweets from one specific user.
Basics./get-follows: Show all followed users and their settings. To change the settings, run /unfollow, then /follow again!
Basics./unfollow-all: If you ever want to stop getting tweets altogether, this command will do it for you!

Setting up messages./set-webhook: This is where you can choose which channel you want the tweets to appear in! Tutorial for this is coming up!
Setting up messages./remove-webhook: If you want to remove the webhook, this is the command to run.

Other.Message visibility: All the previously mentioned commands will only appear for you, meaning that others in your server won't be notified while you are configuring this bot.

Setup (5).You're all set!: You can now run /follow to start receiving tweets!
